articles.description: Unranked Wisconsin, Houston and Penn State college basketball fans celebrate upsets over ranked teams and storm the court.
articles.headline: Fans rush court in a night of upsets

images.caption: Unranked Wisconsin, Houston and Penn State college basketball fans celebrate upsets over ranked teams and storm the court.
images.name: Fans rush court in a night of upsets

articles.description: The Cougars come out on fire from beyond the arc in the 2nd half to beat the Bearcats 67-62.
articles.headline: Houston shocks No. 5 Cincinnati

images.caption: The Cougars come out on fire from beyond the arc in the 2nd half to beat the Bearcats 67-62.
images.name: Houston shocks No. 5 Cincinnati

articles.description: Nick King scored his ninth double-double of the season and Middle Tennessee put the defensive clamps on Southern Mississippi late to earn a 72-62 victory in a Conference USA battle on Thursday night.
articles.headline: C-USA leader Middle Tennessee holds off Southern Miss, 72-62

articles.description: Kenneth Ogbe scored 22 points with four 3-pointers, Brandon Randolph added 17 points, and Utah Valley snapped New Mexico State's 11-game win streak with an 86-79 victory on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Utah Valley beats New Mexico State 86-79

articles.description: Anthony Duruji scored 21 points and swatted 3 shots and Daquan Bracey added 11 points as Louisiana Tech pulled away to beat UAB 73-60 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Duruji and Bracey help Bulldogs escape Blazers

articles.description: Jonathan Stark played all 40 minutes and scored 32 points with five assists and four rebounds to propel Murray State past Jacksonville State 68-60 on Thursday night for its eighth straight victory.
articles.headline: Murray State tops Jacksonville State for eighth straight win
